Source: Population Reference Bureau

Based on the data shown in the table, which of the following accurately describes changes in the roles of women as countries develop economically?

choices.label: More women work in professional jobs
Fewer women enroll in secondary school
Most women work in the home

content.answer: More women work in professional jobs

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe spatial patterns presented in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data.
